findings.title: No explicit checks for `mint` and `swap` calls on uninitialized Pool
findings.description: The `swap` and `mint` functions can be invoked on an uninitialized pool, leading to a potential `revert` midway through execution due to invariant checks.

findings.title: Pool initialization can be front-run
findings.description: The pool initialization process can be manipulated by malicious entities, potentially leading to price manipulation and DoS attacks.
